name: Pearl River Social Casino
description:
Go with the flow with Pearl River Social Casino!

Sign up for and play authentic slot games like African Diamond, Starry Night, Full Moon Diamond, Jackpot Inferno, Crazy Money and much more! There’s also a wide range of Blackjack, Roulette, Bingo, Keno and Video Poker.


• Receive bonus credits when you join, and personalize your account
• Log in every day and build your Daily Bonus from 500 credits right up to 2,800 credits
• Compete with your fellow players on Leaderboard challenges


Happy Spinning!

If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact us at freeplaysupport@pearlriverresort.com.
